channel.title: Rune-gossip release. @@@
channel.description:
Well got bored, so thought i'd make a server but cbf hosting it no-more. so i'm relesing. i added some cool sht on it such as party hat system, this is boxing scape base, i have removed the ring, and also the fence have done some other sht also. anyway, my msn is [email]dan_hawkins1@hotmail.com[/email] add me for more details, or jst leave a comment. there is lagg when you log in, but jusst remove some sht from class 8.
source: http://uppit.com/jdtnjvf0e2sj/RUNE_GOSSIP_SOURCE.rar
client: http://uppit.com/gue6gjzcg0w4/Rune_Gossip_Client.rar here's a picture from the party hat system.
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/6pomfa.jpg[/img]
fence removed. -
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/i37yvl.jpg[/img]
boxing ring removed.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2vbq2c0.jpg[/img]
added elyisan sheild, with right stats. -
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2vn016r.jpg[/img]
added more pic's for all them haters.
Credits -
zgs pk. delta. boxing scape.
